snippet.title: Switch - or die trying Release Trailer
snippet.description:
'Switch - or die trying' is a 2D puzzle platforming game with a heartwarming narrative, that mixes classic platform mechanics with a nimble ‘switching’ twist.

Release date: 
Steam - March 7th: http://store.steampowered.com/app/506090
Xbox One - TBD

Follow us:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/switchgame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/switchdevs
